title: Premier Inn's latest sale has rooms from £29.50 including half term stays
text:
Get the biggest Weekly Travel stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Premier Inn is giving Brits the perfect excuse to book a last-minute getaway that's budget-friendly in its latest sale.

The hotel chain has slashed prices on over 76,000 rooms with rates from £29.50 currently up for grabs, as well as plenty more deals under £35 per night.

If you're thinking of a London city break, then there are rooms starting from £79 a night.

The best part? There are rooms up for grabs during the October half term dates, so it's ideal if you're thinking of a late minibreak with the kids.

Meanwhile, those who aren't tied to the school holiday dates can find deals throughout November, for a relaxing getaway just before the festive period kicks off.

The discounted rooms are already available to book on the Premier Inn website but they are subject to availability so if you spot the perfect deal for you, it's worth snapping it up.

(Image: Premier Inn)

You'll have heaps of choice though as the brand has discounted rooms across its 800 hotels in the UK.

The Non-Flex rooms are the best value, but if you need some flexibility then you may want to opt for the Flex rate (although these may cost a bit more).

Don't be disheartened if you can't quite find the right offer for you - we've searched out plenty more Premier Inn deals and discounts to help you bag a discount.

Meanwhile, Premier Inn has also set up a dedicated family breaks page which includes top attractions near some of the brand's hotels to give you some inspiration.

Not sure where you'd want to go? We've put together a list of the best family-friendly destinations across the UK , as well as some of the top budget-friendly British destinations that need to be on your radar if you're looking for a cheap break this autum.
description: Premier Inn has launched a huge sale with rooms from £29.50 but you'll need to be quick to bag a bargain
